name: Chicken Avocado Pizza
author: postpunkmom
summary: A deliciously different California inspired pizza made with avocado spread in place of pizza sauce, and topped with chicken and Monterey Jack cheese. Great for a light meal.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, or to taste
1 cup chopped cooked chicken breast meat
directions: If you have a pizza stone, place it in the oven while it preheats
In a food processor, combine the avocados and cilantro
Puree while adding lime juice and salt to taste
Slice the garlic clove in half, and rub the cut side onto the tops of the pizza crusts for flavor
Brush both sides of the crusts with olive oil
Spread the avocado mixture thickly over the top of each crust, then arrange chicken and tomatoes on top
Sprinkle with cheese, and season lightly with cayenne pepper
Place pizzas on a baking sheet if you do not have a pizza stone
Broil for about 5 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the cheese has just melted and the crust is lightly toasted
